          <title>
            <string language="fr">Formation des roches à partir de  solides dissous</string>
            <string language="en">Formation of rocks from dissolved solids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der Felsen von aufgelösten Körpern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação das rochas dos sólidos dissolvidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione delle roccie dai solidi dissolti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός των βράχων από τα διαλυμένα στερεά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de rocas de los sólidos disueltos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre comment les mers et les lacs deviennent concentrés en solides dissous ce qui résulte en la formation des roches.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how seas and lakes get concentrated with dissolved solids which results to formation of rocks.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la désagrégation chimique</string>
            <string language="en">chemical weathering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">concentration</string>
            <string language="en">concentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">solides dissous</string>
            <string language="en">dissolved solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lac</string>
            <string language="en">lake</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches</string>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mer</string>
            <string language="en">sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">évaporation de l'eau</string>
            <string language="en">water evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Meere und Seen mit 
aufgelösten Körpern konzentriert erhalten, welche Resultate zur 
Anordnung der Felsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os mares e os lagos
começam concentrados com sólidos dissolvidos que resultados à 
formação das rochas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come i mari ed i 
laghi ottengono concentrati con i solidi dissolti quali risultati a 
formazione delle roccie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι θάλασσες και οι 
λίμνες παίρνουν συγκεντρωμένες με τα διαλυμένα στερεά που οδηγεί
στο σχηματισμό των βράχων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo los mares y los 
lagos consiguen concentrados con los sólidos disueltos qué 
resultados a la formación de rocas.</string>
          </description>
